entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Problem using DefaultAzureCredential() with Cosmos EF -- More than twenty 'IServiceProvider' instances have been created. #34889

Closed

  • "The entity type" "is mapped to the stored procedure" "however the store-generated properties" "are not mapped to any output parameter or result column." #34863
  • Invalid Column Name 'XXX' Exception When Using GroupJoin Without Foreign Key Relationship #34339
  • [Microsoft.Data.Sqlite] Version of NuGet dependency SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 does not correspond with source code #34860
  • Compiled Model causes InvalidOperationException on first call #34817
  • change LogExecutedCommand elapsed parameter from string to int or do not send thousands seperator #34281
  • Application crash when locking `compilationLock` in `RelationalCommandCache.cs` #34796
  • Handling DbUpdateConcurrencyException inside TransactionScope #34873
  • System.Data.SqlClient is out of date #34856

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Avoid infinite recursion on identifying shadow FKs #34892
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/8.0] Avoid infinite recursion on identifying shadow FKs #34891
    Servicing-consider
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34890
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #34887
  • [release/9.0] Fix conditional test evaluation in funcletizer #34886
    Servicing-approved

Merged

  • [release/9.0] (TELL MODE) small xml doc fix (copy paste error) (#34857) #34888
    tell-mode
  • [release/8.0] Update Microsoft.Extensions.HostFactoryResolver.Sources version #34884
    tell-mode
  • add MariaDB to README.md #34885
  • [release/9.0] Don't execute empty batches #34870
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #34854
  • Expose SQLite VFS option in connection string #34864
  • Add implementation for Nanoseconds and Microseconds for DateTime[Offset], TimeSpan, {Date|Time}Only. #34861
  • fix-kusto-scaffold #34832
  • [release/9.0] Don't break transactions across batches #34869
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Don't execute empty batches #34882
    Servicing-approved
